articles.title: Lorraine Kelly emotionally bids farewell to BBC star with tribute as he quits - The Mirror
articles.description: ITV presenter Lorraine Kelly took to social media to wish radio DJ Steve Wright farewell after his last Steve Wright in the Afternoon hit the radio waves
articles.content:
Lorraine Kelly has paid an emotional tribute to fellow broadcaster and radio DJ Steve Wright after his final BBC Radio 2 show aired on Sunday.
